content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":234862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱりその中でも魔王の子は頭一つか二つ","translatedEnglishLine":"After all, among them, the children of the Demon King stand out by a head or two."},{"lineNumber":234863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　抜けとるね」","translatedEnglishLine":"They truly stand apart."},{"lineNumber":234864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「下手すると魔王の子達だけの","translatedEnglishLine":"If things go badly, it could end up being"},{"lineNumber":234865,"originalJapaneseLine":"　独壇場にもなりかねないんやけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"a stage dominated solely by the children of the Demon King..."},{"lineNumber":234866,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その牙城を崩す選手が出るかどうか","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether or not a player will arise to break that stronghold."},{"lineNumber":234867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その辺りが今大会の見所の一つになるやろね」","translatedEnglishLine":"That will likely be one of the highlights of this tournament."},{"lineNumber":234868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど」","translatedEnglishLine":"I see."},{"lineNumber":234869,"originalJapaneseLine":"「明日以降も試合は沢山あります。","translatedEnglishLine":"There will be many matches from tomorrow onward."},{"lineNumber":234870,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一つずつつぶさに見守っていきましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's carefully watch each one."},{"lineNumber":234871,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この番組は、コロシアム南西の要塞、","translatedEnglishLine":"This program was brought to you by the fortress southwest of the Coliseum,"},{"lineNumber":234872,"originalJapaneseLine":"　堅牢なるトップリゾートでお馴染み、","translatedEnglishLine":"famous as the sturdy top resort,"},{"lineNumber":234873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アルカトラズの提供でお送りしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alcatraz."},{"lineNumber":234874,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":234875,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":234876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、ドギ負けてんじゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait, Dogi lost!"},{"lineNumber":234877,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドギは負けていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Dogi had lost."},{"lineNumber":234878,"originalJapaneseLine":"昼間、試合のない日、","translatedEnglishLine":"During the day, on a day without matches,"},{"lineNumber":234879,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは他の選手達の真似をして、","translatedEnglishLine":"you decided to imitate the other players,"},{"lineNumber":234880,"originalJapaneseLine":"迷宮の中で修行をすることにした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and train inside the labyrinth."},{"lineNumber":234881,"originalJapaneseLine":"試練迷宮の地下一階は普通の迷宮だったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The first basement level of the trial labyrinth was a normal maze,"},{"lineNumber":234882,"originalJapaneseLine":"地下二階は一面水の世界。","translatedEnglishLine":"but the second basement level was a vast world of water."},{"lineNumber":234883,"originalJapaneseLine":"上とのあまりの差に面食らったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"You were taken aback by the huge difference from above,"},{"lineNumber":234884,"originalJapaneseLine":"こういうものなのかと思い、","translatedEnglishLine":"but you accepted it as simply how it was,"},{"lineNumber":234885,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは納得しておいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and came to terms with it."},{"lineNumber":234886,"originalJapaneseLine":"雑魚ばかりだったが、他にすることもなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though mostly weak enemies were around, with nothing else to do,"},{"lineNumber":234887,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは雑魚狩りをしたり、リセットに","translatedEnglishLine":"you hunted those weak foes and enjoyed meals prepared by Reset,"},{"lineNumber":234888,"originalJapaneseLine":"作ってもらったお弁当を食べたりして過ごした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and spent your time that way."},{"lineNumber":234889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おかえり、＜エール＞ちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Welcome back, <Yell>."},{"lineNumber":234890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お疲れ様、ご飯の用意できてるよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good job, your meal is ready.\""},{"lineNumber":234891,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋に戻るとリセットが迎えてくれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"When you returned to your room, Reset greeted you."},{"lineNumber":234892,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日は他の面々は部屋に来ていないようである。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seemed the others had not come to the room today."},{"lineNumber":234893,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはリセットとご飯を食べ、","translatedEnglishLine":"You ate with Reset,"},{"lineNumber":234894,"originalJapaneseLine":"のんびりと過ごした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and spent a relaxing time."},{"lineNumber":234895,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お風呂出たー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I just got out of the bath!\""},{"lineNumber":234896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時間は間に合ったかな？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did you make it in time?"},{"lineNumber":234897,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああうん、間に合ったね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, yes, just made it.\""},{"lineNumber":234898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？　なんのことって？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What do you mean?"},{"lineNumber":234899,"originalJapaneseLine":"　闘神ダイジェストのことだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm talking about the Battle God Digest.\""},{"lineNumber":234900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日は長田君の試合があったよね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today, Nagata's match happened, right?"},{"lineNumber":234901,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それとザンスちゃんも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And also Zansu-chan's..."},{"lineNumber":234902,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔法ビジョンで闘神ダイジェストを見てみよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's watch the Battle God Digest on the magic vision.\""},{"lineNumber":234903,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":234904,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":234905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「闘神ダイジェスト！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Battle God Digest!\""},{"lineNumber":234906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「四ブロックで二試合ずつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"There were two matches each in four blocks,"},{"lineNumber":234907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　計八試合がありました」","translatedEnglishLine":"making a total of eight matches."},{"lineNumber":234908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「左が勝者、右が敗者です」","translatedEnglishLine":"The winner is on the left, the loser on the right."},{"lineNumber":234909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Ａブロック三戦目、","translatedEnglishLine":"Third match in Block A,"},{"lineNumber":234910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アームズ・アークＶＳ骸骨騎士ガシャケィラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms Ark VS Skeleton Knight Gashakeira."},{"lineNumber":234911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「優勝候補筆頭、レアハンターアームズ選手と、","translatedEnglishLine":"Top favorite contender, Rare Hunter Arms, and,"},{"lineNumber":234912,"originalJapaneseLine":"　モンスターであるボーンの突然変異、","translatedEnglishLine":"a monstrous mutant of Bone,"},{"lineNumber":234913,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガシャケィラ選手の戦い」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gashakeira's battle."},{"lineNumber":234914,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ボーン言うかもう騎士みたいな出で立ちやね。","translatedEnglishLine":"You could say he's a Bone, but he looks more like a knight."},{"lineNumber":234915,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いぶし銀な選手や」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's a seasoned veteran kind of player."},{"lineNumber":234916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見る者は敵ですら魅了すると言われる","translatedEnglishLine":"It is said that Gashakeira's incredible swordsmanship"},{"lineNumber":234917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガシャケィラ選手の凄まじい剣技が冴え渡り","translatedEnglishLine":"charms even his enemies,"},{"lineNumber":234918,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アームズ選手を追い詰めますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"and he corners Arms, but..."},{"lineNumber":234919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦士としての意地でしょうか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps out of a warrior's pride,"},{"lineNumber":234920,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アームズ選手はアイテムに頼ることなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms refuses to rely on items,"},{"lineNumber":234921,"originalJapaneseLine":"　武器一つでこれをねじ伏せ決着」","translatedEnglishLine":"and with only his weapon, overcomes this to win."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりその中でも魔王の子は頭一つか二つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, among them, the children of the Demon King stand out by a head or two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抜けとるね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They truly stand apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「下手すると魔王の子達だけの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If things go badly, it could end up being

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 独壇場にもなりかねないんやけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a stage dominated solely by the children of the Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その牙城を崩す選手が出るかどうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether or not a player will arise to break that stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その辺りが今大会の見所の一つになるやろね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That will likely be one of the highlights of this tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日以降も試合は沢山あります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There will be many matches from tomorrow onward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つずつつぶさに見守っていきましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's carefully watch each one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、コロシアム南西の要塞、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This program was brought to you by the fortress southwest of the Coliseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅牢なるトップリゾートでお馴染み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: famous as the sturdy top resort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アルカトラズの提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcatraz.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、ドギ負けてんじゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, Dogi lost!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドギは負けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dogi had lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間、試合のない日、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the day, on a day without matches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは他の選手達の真似をして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you decided to imitate the other players,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷宮の中で修行をすることにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and train inside the labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試練迷宮の地下一階は普通の迷宮だったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first basement level of the trial labyrinth was a normal maze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下二階は一面水の世界。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the second basement level was a vast world of water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上とのあまりの差に面食らったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were taken aback by the huge difference from above,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういうものなのかと思い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you accepted it as simply how it was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは納得しておいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and came to terms with it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚ばかりだったが、他にすることもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though mostly weak enemies were around, with nothing else to do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは雑魚狩りをしたり、リセットに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you hunted those weak foes and enjoyed meals prepared by Reset,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作ってもらったお弁当を食べたりして過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and spent your time that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おかえり、＜エール＞ちゃん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Welcome back, <Yell>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お疲れ様、ご飯の用意できてるよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good job, your meal is ready."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋に戻るとリセットが迎えてくれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you returned to your room, Reset greeted you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は他の面々は部屋に来ていないようである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seemed the others had not come to the room today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはリセットとご飯を食べ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You ate with Reset,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のんびりと過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and spent a relaxing time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お風呂出たー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just got out of the bath!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間は間に合ったかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you make it in time?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああうん、間に合ったね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yes, just made it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　なんのことって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ダイジェストのことだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm talking about the Battle God Digest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日は長田君の試合があったよね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, Nagata's match happened, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとザンスちゃんも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And also Zansu-chan's...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法ビジョンで闘神ダイジェストを見てみよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's watch the Battle God Digest on the magic vision."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神ダイジェスト！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Battle God Digest!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四ブロックで二試合ずつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were two matches each in four blocks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計八試合がありました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making a total of eight matches.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左が勝者、右が敗者です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The winner is on the left, the loser on the right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ａブロック三戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Third match in Block A,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ・アークＶＳ骸骨騎士ガシャケィラ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms Ark VS Skeleton Knight Gashakeira.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝候補筆頭、レアハンターアームズ選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Top favorite contender, Rare Hunter Arms, and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターであるボーンの突然変異、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a monstrous mutant of Bone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガシャケィラ選手の戦い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gashakeira's battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ボーン言うかもう騎士みたいな出で立ちやね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say he's a Bone, but he looks more like a knight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いぶし銀な選手や」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a seasoned veteran kind of player.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見る者は敵ですら魅了すると言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is said that Gashakeira's incredible swordsmanship

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガシャケィラ選手の凄まじい剣技が冴え渡り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: charms even his enemies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ選手を追い詰めますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he corners Arms, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦士としての意地でしょうか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps out of a warrior's pride,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ選手はアイテムに頼ることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms refuses to rely on items,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武器一つでこれをねじ伏せ決着」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with only his weapon, overcomes this to win.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりその中でも魔王の子は頭一つか二つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, among them, the children of the Demon King stand out by a head or two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抜けとるね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They truly stand apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「下手すると魔王の子達だけの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If things go badly, it could end up being

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 独壇場にもなりかねないんやけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a stage dominated solely by the children of the Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その牙城を崩す選手が出るかどうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether or not a player will arise to break that stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その辺りが今大会の見所の一つになるやろね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That will likely be one of the highlights of this tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日以降も試合は沢山あります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There will be many matches from tomorrow onward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つずつつぶさに見守っていきましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's carefully watch each one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、コロシアム南西の要塞、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This program was brought to you by the fortress southwest of the Coliseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅牢なるトップリゾートでお馴染み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: famous as the sturdy top resort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アルカトラズの提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alcatraz.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、ドギ負けてんじゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, Dogi lost!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドギは負けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dogi had lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間、試合のない日、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the day, on a day without matches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは他の選手達の真似をして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you decided to imitate the other players,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷宮の中で修行をすることにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and train inside the labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試練迷宮の地下一階は普通の迷宮だったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first basement level of the trial labyrinth was a normal maze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下二階は一面水の世界。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the second basement level was a vast world of water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上とのあまりの差に面食らったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were taken aback by the huge difference from above,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういうものなのかと思い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you accepted it as simply how it was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは納得しておいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and came to terms with it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚ばかりだったが、他にすることもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though mostly weak enemies were around, with nothing else to do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは雑魚狩りをしたり、リセットに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you hunted those weak foes and enjoyed meals prepared by Reset,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作ってもらったお弁当を食べたりして過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and spent your time that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おかえり、＜エール＞ちゃん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Welcome back, <Yell>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お疲れ様、ご飯の用意できてるよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good job, your meal is ready."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋に戻るとリセットが迎えてくれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you returned to your room, Reset greeted you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は他の面々は部屋に来ていないようである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seemed the others had not come to the room today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはリセットとご飯を食べ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You ate with Reset,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のんびりと過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and spent a relaxing time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お風呂出たー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just got out of the bath!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間は間に合ったかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you make it in time?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああうん、間に合ったね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yes, just made it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　なんのことって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ダイジェストのことだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm talking about the Battle God Digest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日は長田君の試合があったよね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, Nagata's match happened, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとザンスちゃんも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And also Zansu-chan's...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法ビジョンで闘神ダイジェストを見てみよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's watch the Battle God Digest on the magic vision."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神ダイジェスト！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Battle God Digest!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四ブロックで二試合ずつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were two matches each in four blocks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計八試合がありました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making a total of eight matches.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左が勝者、右が敗者です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The winner is on the left, the loser on the right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ａブロック三戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Third match in Block A,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ・アークＶＳ骸骨騎士ガシャケィラ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms Ark VS Skeleton Knight Gashakeira.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝候補筆頭、レアハンターアームズ選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Top favorite contender, Rare Hunter Arms, and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターであるボーンの突然変異、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a monstrous mutant of Bone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガシャケィラ選手の戦い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gashakeira's battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ボーン言うかもう騎士みたいな出で立ちやね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say he's a Bone, but he looks more like a knight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いぶし銀な選手や」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a seasoned veteran kind of player.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見る者は敵ですら魅了すると言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is said that Gashakeira's incredible swordsmanship

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガシャケィラ選手の凄まじい剣技が冴え渡り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: charms even his enemies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ選手を追い詰めますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he corners Arms, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦士としての意地でしょうか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps out of a warrior's pride,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ選手はアイテムに頼ることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms refuses to rely on items,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武器一つでこれをねじ伏せ決着」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with only his weapon, overcomes this to win.
